column4: what would be the best way to move a .tar off my ubuntu server to my ubuntu desktop
wget it and then delete it off the server?
I do not have Apache setup
I say to set it up then
Thanks that worked, I got it
yeah, if it is owned by root, you could also just do "sudo chmod go-w file"
Your saying that only the owner can write to the file?
I am saying that everyone but the owner can write to it
I want only root to write to it not everyone but owner
ok in this instance doing "sudo chmod 644 file" not sure how informative that is though for permission changes in the future
OK I did 644 now its rw r r so only the owner can write to it correct?
